import typography from'assets/theme/base/typography';import borders from'assets/theme/base/borders';import colors from'assets/theme/base/colors';// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from'assets/theme/functions/pxToRem';var size=typography.size;var text=colors.text;var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth,borderColor=borders.borderColor;var dialogContent={styleOverrides:{root:{padding:pxToRem(16),fontSize:size.md,color:text.main},dividers:{borderTop:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(borderColor),borderBottom:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(borderColor)}}};export default dialogContent;
